level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Surveyor of the District of Columbia, duties, see § 1-1301 et seq.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) repeal of section, see § 7008 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-377, July 14, 2014, 61 DCR 7598, 20 STAT 3696).

For temporary (90 days) repeal of section, see § 7008 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-449, October 10, 2014, 61 DCR 10915, 20 STAT 4188).

For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 7008 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-566, January 9, 2015, 62 DCR 884, 21 STAT 541).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-289
level.text: For history of Law 18-289, see notes under § 8-2201.
